About the Company: Rishi Techtex Ltd is one of the leading manufacturers and exporters of Shade Net, Windbreaker net, Bird Net, Hail net, Scaffolding nets, Crop Protection nets, Woven sacks & fabrics.The product range of the company includes Knitted, Woven Bags and Rachel Bags.The product range of the company has application in industry, agriculture, horticulture, civil engineering, packaging and constructions etc.The company exports their products to various countries like Sri Lanka, UK, Portugal, Africa, Central America, Middle East, Australia, and New Zealand.
